name: Awesome Root Beer Float Soda Pop Maker
name_original: Awesome Root Beer Float Soda Pop Maker
description:
You can never go wrong with a delicious root beer float! Awesome Root Beer Float Soda Pop Maker allows you to create your tasty root beer float with numerous designs and decorations!

[HOW TO PLAY!]
-Create, pour, & mix your root beer float using the maker machines!
-Choose your favorite cup, straws!
-Loaded with decorations to top off your drink!
-Drink and save your favorite ones to share!







*NOTE: This game is free to play but offers in-game purchases that are made with real money.
